input_text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Nova: Excuse me. Can you tell me how to get to City Hall?
Marion: Yes. Go to the next corner and turn left onto Center Street. Walk three blocks to Second Avenue and turn right. Walk two more blocks and you'll see City Hall on the left.
Nova: I'm sorry. I didn't follow you. Could you please repeat that?
Marion: Okay. First, go to the next corner and turn left onto Center Street.
Nova: Uh-huh.
Marion: Then, walk three blocks to Second Avenue an turn right. Are you with me so far?
Nova: Yes. I'm following you.
Marion: Then, walk two more blocks an you ' ll see City Hall on the left. Have you got all that?
Nova: Yes. Now I've got it. Thank you very much.

Now write a summary of the conversation:
input_text.Response A: Nova asked Marion how to get to City Hall. Marion gave Nova instructions on how to get there.
input_text.Response B: Nova wants to know how to get to City Hall. Marion gives her directions.

label_annotations.factors_a: Yes, they were both quite short so I based my scores on which one had more detail
label_annotations.factors_b: Yes, they were both quite short so I based my scores on which one had more detail
